name: Bulbasaur
sum1: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
sum2: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.

name: Ivysaur
sum1: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
sum2: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.

name: Venusaur
sum1: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
sum2: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.

name: Charmander
sum1: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
sum2: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

name: Charmeleon
sum1: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
sum2: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.

name: Charizard
sum1: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.
sum2: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.

name: Squirtle
sum1: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.
sum2: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.

name: Wartortle
sum1: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.
sum2: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.

name: Blastoise
sum1: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.
sum2: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.

name: Caterpie
sum1: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
sum2: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: Metapod
sum1: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
sum2: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a harsh attack.

name: Butterfree
sum1: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
sum2: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.

name: Weedle
sum1: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.
sum2: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

name: Kakuna
sum1: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.
sum2: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

name: Beedrill
sum1: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
sum2: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

name: Pidgey
sum1: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.
sum2: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

name: Pidgeotto
sum1: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.
sum2: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

name: Pidgeot
sum1: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.
sum2: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

name: Rattata
sum1: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area.
sum2: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area.

name: Raticate
sum1: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.
sum2: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

name: Spearow
sum1: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.
sum2: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

name: Fearow
sum1: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
sum2: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

name: Ekans
sum1: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
sum2: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

name: Arbok
sum1: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
sum2: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

name: Pikachu
sum1: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.
sum2: When Pikachu meet, they’ll touch their tails together and exchange electricity through them as a form of greeting.

name: Raichu
sum1: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.
sum2: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.

name: Sandshrew
sum1: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokémon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.
sum2: It burrows into the ground to create its nest. If hard stones impede its tunneling, it uses its sharp claws to shatter them and then carries on digging.

name: Sandslash
sum1: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokémon’s spikes will feel when touched.
sum2: It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws. Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.

name: Nidoran♀
sum1: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, they’ll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.
sum2: It uses its hard incisor teeth to crush and eat berries. The tip of a female Nidoran’s horn is a bit more rounded than the tip of a male’s horn.

name: Nidorina
sum1: The horn on its head has atrophied. It’s thought that this happens so Nidorina’s children won’t get poked while their mother is feeding them.
sum2: If the group is threatened, these Pokémon will band together to assault enemies with a chorus of ultrasonic waves.

name: Nidoqueen
sum1: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.
sum2: It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps between the spines on its back. The spines will never secrete poison while young are present.

name: Nidoran♂
sum1: The horn on a male Nidoran’s forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokémon, always straining its large ears.
sum2: Small but brave, this Pokémon will hold its ground and even risk its life in battle to protect the female it’s friendly with.

name: Nidorino
sum1: With a horn that’s harder than diamond, this Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone.
sum2: It’s nervous and quick to act aggressively. The potency of its poison increases along with the level of adrenaline present in its body.

name: Nidoking
sum1: When it goes on a rampage, it’s impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it’s lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.
sum2: Nidoking prides itself on its strength. It’s forceful and spirited in battle, making use of its thick tail and diamond-crushing horn.

sum1: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
sum2: Its adorable behavior and cry make it highly popular. However, this cute Pokémon is rarely found.
name: Clefairy
Clefable
sum1: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
sum2: Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin drop from over a mile away, so they’re usually found in quiet places.

name: Vulpix
sum1: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.
sum2: As each tail grows, its fur becomes more lustrous. When held, it feels slightly warm.

name: Ninetales
sum1: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.
sum2: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.

name: Jigglypuff
sum1: Jigglypuff has top-notch lung capacity, even by comparison to other Pokémon. It won’t stop singing its lullabies until its foes fall asleep.
sum2: By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.

name: Wigglytuff
sum1: The more air it takes in, the more it inflates. If opponents catch it in a bad mood, it will inflate itself to an enormous size to intimidate them.
sum2: It’s proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate. In particular, the curl on its forehead has a texture that’s perfectly heavenly.

name: Zubat
sum1: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.
sum2: Zubat live in caves, down where the sun’s light won’t reach. In the morning, they gather together to keep each other warm as they sleep.

name: Golbat
sum1: It loves to drink other creatures’ blood. It’s said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it’s gathered.
sum2: Its feet are tiny, but this Pokémon walks skillfully. It sneaks up on sleeping prey before sinking in its fangs and slurping up blood.

name: Oddish
sum1: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.
sum2: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.

name: Gloom
sum1: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.
sum2: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.

name: Vileplume
sum1: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
sum2: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: Paras
sum1: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

name: Parasect
sum1: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushroom on its back. The mushroom appears to do all the thinking.

name: Venonat
sum1: Its large eyes act as radar. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.

name: Venomoth
sum1: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove from skin. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.

name: Diglett
sum1: If a Diglett digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.
sum2: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.

name: Dugtrio
sum1: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
sum2: These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it’s like underground.

name: Meowth
sum1: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.
sum2: It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. It doesn’t get along with Galarian Meowth.

name: Persian
sum1: Getting this prideful Pokémon to warm up to you takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the moment it gets annoyed.
sum2: Its elegant and refined behavior clashes with that of the barbaric Perrserker. The relationship between the two is one of mutual disdain.

name: Psyduck
sum1: Psyduck is constantly beset by headaches. If the Pokémon lets its strange power erupt, apparently the pain subsides for a while.
sum2: As Psyduck gets stressed out, its headache gets progressively worse. It uses intense psychic energy to overwhelm those around it.

name: Golduck
sum1: This Pokémon lives in gently flowing rivers. It paddles through the water with its long limbs, putting its graceful swimming skills on display.
sum2: Old tales tell of Golduck punishing those that defiled its river. The guilty were dragged into the water and taken away.

name: Mankey
sum1: An agile Pokémon that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.

name: Primeape
sum1: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.

name: Growlithe
sum1: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
sum2: Extremely loyal, it will fearlessly bark at any opponent to protect its own Trainer from harm.

name: Arcanine
sum1: The sight of it running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night has captivated many people.
sum2: A Pokémon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

name: Poliwag
sum1: For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokémon’s innards showing through the skin.
sum2: In rivers with fast-flowing water, this Pokémon will cling to a rock by using its thick lips, which act like a suction cup.

name: Poliwhirl
sum1: Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirl’s has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep.
sum2: This Pokémon’s sweat is a slimy mucus. When captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies’ grasp and escape.

name: Poliwrath
sum1: Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward.
sum2: Poliwrath is skilled at both swimming and martial arts. It uses its well-trained arms to dish out powerful punches.

name: Abra
sum1: This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abra’s dreams affect the powers that the Pokémon wields.
sum2: Abra can teleport in its sleep. Apparently the more deeply Abra sleeps, the farther its teleportations go.

name: Kadabra
sum1: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.
sum2: This Pokémon’s telekinesis is immensely powerful. To prepare for evolution, Kadabra stores up psychic energy in the star on its forehead.

name: Alakazam
sum1: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.
sum2: Alakazam wields potent psychic powers. It’s said that this Pokémon used these powers to create the spoons it holds.

name: Machop
sum1: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
sum2: Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.

name: Machoke
sum1: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
sum2: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.

name: Machamp
sum1: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
sum2: With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.

name: Bellsprout
sum1: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

name: Weepinbell
sum1: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.

name: Victreebel
sum1: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.

name: Tentacool
sum1: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.
sum2: This Pokémon is mostly made of water. A Tentacool out in the ocean is very hard to spot, because its body blends in with the sea.

name: Tentacruel
sum1: When the red orbs on Tentacruel’s head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.
sum2: Its 80 tentacles can stretch and shrink freely. Tentacruel ensnares prey in a net of spread-out tentacles, delivering venomous stings to its catch.

name: Geodude
sum1: Commonly found near mountain trails and the like. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.

name: Graveler
sum1: Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid.

name: Golem
sum1: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it’s exposed to air.

name: Ponyta
sum1: It can’t run properly when it’s newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.
sum2: If you’ve been accepted by Ponyta, its burning mane is mysteriously no longer hot to the touch.

name: Rapidash
sum1: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.
sum2: The fastest runner becomes the leader, and it decides the herd’s pace and direction of travel.

name: Slowpoke
sum1: Slow-witted and oblivious, this Pokémon won’t feel any pain if its tail gets eaten. It won’t notice when its tail grows back, either.
sum2: When this Pokémon’s tail is soaked in water, sweetness seeps from it. Slowpoke uses this trait to lure in and fish up other Pokémon.

name: Slowbro
sum1: Slowpoke became Slowbro when a Shellder bit on to its tail. Sweet flavors seeping from the tail make the Shellder feel as if its life is a dream.
sum2: Being bitten by a Shellder shocked this Pokémon into standing on two legs. If the Shellder lets go, it seems Slowbro will turn back into a Slowpoke.

name: Magnemite
sum1: At times, Magnemite runs out of electricity and ends up on the ground. If you give batteries to a grounded Magnemite, it’ll start moving again.
sum2: It subsists on electricity. As Magnemite flies, it emits electromagnetic waves from the units on each side of its body.

name: Magneton
sum1: This Pokémon is three Magnemite that have linked together. Magneton sends out powerful radio waves to study its surroundings.
sum2: This Pokémon is constantly putting out a powerful magnetic force. Most computers go haywire when a Magneton approaches.

name: Farfetch'd
sum1: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.
sum2: They use a plant stalk as a weapon, but not all of them use it in the same way. Several distinct styles of stalk fighting have been observed.

name: Doduo
sum1: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.

name: Dodrio
sum1: One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies.

name: Seel
sum1: Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Dewgong
sum1: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

name: Grimer
sum1: Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won’t grow in its path.

name: Muk
sum1: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell.

name: Shellder
sum1: It swims facing backward by opening and closing its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast.
sum2: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: Cloyster
sum1: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.
sum2: Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superior strength.

name: Gastly
sum1: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
sum2: With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.

name: Haunter
sum1: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
sum2: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.

name: Gengar
sum1: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.
sum2: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.

name: Onix
sum1: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
sum2: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.

name: Drowzee
sum1: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it had eaten in the past.

name: Hypno
sum1: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

name: Krabby
sum1: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.
sum2: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

name: Kingler
sum1: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
sum2: Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when it’s not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.

name: Voltorb
sum1: It is said to camouflage itself as a Poké Ball. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.

name: Electrode
sum1: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.

name: Exeggcute
sum1: Though it may look like it’s just a bunch of eggs, it’s a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.
sum2: These Pokémon get nervous when they’re not in a group of six. The minute even one member of the group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.

name: Exeggutor
sum1: Each of Exeggutor’s three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don’t seem to be very interested in one another.
sum2: When they work together, Exeggutor’s three heads can put out powerful psychic energy. Cloudy days make this Pokémon sluggish.

name: Cubone
sum1: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.
sum2: This Pokémon wears the skull of its deceased mother. Sometimes Cubone’s dreams make it cry, but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.
